Headline: #35 31st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Wallace
ShortDescription: #35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Wallace, 35th and Halsted, due to police activity near 31st/Wallace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Wallace, 35th and Halsted, due to police activity near 31st/Wallace.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a door problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
